QuestData.Title: The First Watch
QuestData.Description:
As you can see, the coven has conscripted my own guardsmen into their service. Though I am loath to battle my own, these men are too corrupted by the coven's magic to be saved.
For them, death is the only mercy we can give.
The Inquisitors and I can handle the regiment stationed outside. We will need you to find and take out their leader.
Your Inquisitors await your command, $c. Are you ready to take the tower?
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: The Heartsbane witch leading the garrison at Watchman's Rise.
QuestData.LogDescription: Defeat Sister Adela at Watchman's Rise.
QuestData.RewardText:
Well fought, $c. The tower is ours.
Now, we should set our sights on Corlain proper!
